Store - Class in <Unnamed>
Represents a store which has a name, a catalog, a list of admins, a list of customers, and a queue of orders placed by customers.

Initializes a Store object without any parameter.
StoreManager - Class in <Unnamed>
The StoreManager class handles the overall flow of the store system, including registering and logging in users, displaying the catalog of products, and managing the store (for admins).
StoreManager() - Constructor for class StoreManager
Creates a new instance of StoreManager and initializes the store with data from the systemManager.
systemManager - Class in <Unnamed>
The systemManager class is responsible for managing the overall system and interacting with the store, customers, and admins.
